title: Please help me....What is the name of this font..
content:
Please help me to identify this font and if possible let me know where i can find it.  
This is the font:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205136im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled_3860.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205136/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled_22.png) | 4.02 KB |
author: prabhu vinod

comments.content:
The best place to post to find the name of a font is:  
 [http://www.typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205136/http:/www.typophile.com/typeid "http://www.typophile.com/typeid")  
or click on the "Font ID" link at the top of the page.

Edit: Now here [http://www.typophile.com/node/117284](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205136/http:/www.typophile.com/node/117284 "http://www.typophile.com/node/117284")
